props.heading: Designing digital experiences that actually scale
props.subheading: Product strategy, design systems, and engineering to ship better products.

steps.label: Empathize / Discover
steps.desc: Conduct thorough research to gain a deep, human-centered understanding of the user and their problems.

steps.label: Define
steps.desc: Synthesize research findings into a clear, concise problem statement to align the team on the core challenge.

steps.label: Ideate / Develop Ideas
steps.desc: Brainstorm a wide range of potential solutions to the defined problem without immediate judgment.

steps.label: Prototype
steps.desc: Create low-cost, tangible representations of potential solutions that can be evaluated and tested.

steps.label: Testing
steps.desc: Gather user feedback on prototypes to validate concepts, uncover issues, and learn what works and what doesn't.

steps.label: Iterate and Implement
steps.desc: Continuously refine the design based on testing results and prepare the final, improved solution for launch and ongoing monitoring.

highLevelArchitecture.summary: Static single-page application served from CDN. Site content is static JSON. No server backend required for public site. Optional serverless endpoint for contact form if needed.
highLevelArchitecture.diagramText: Browser -> CDN -> Static SPA (React/Vite) -> static JSON (embedded or fetched) -> optional serverless function (contactForm) -> mail relay

frontend.rendering: Client-side SPA or static prerender with SSG
frontend.state: Local state (Context / Zustand) only if needed

data.alternate: Headless CMS (Contentful / Sanity / Notion) for non-dev editing

optionalServerless.provider: Vercel Serverless / Netlify Functions / Firebase Cloud Functions
optionalServerless.purpose: Send email, store lead to Google Sheets or Zapier

analytics.performance: Defer analytics until after first paint

monitoring.uptime: External uptime monitor if using serverless endpoints
